infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera. This lets you take pictures and recording videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone. This lets you make voice, video calls and more.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to upload photos from your library. This also lets you save photos to your library.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your location for notification purposes.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Enabling Face ID allows you quick and secure access to your account.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to upload photos from your library. This also lets you save photos to your library.
